onbon.y2.play.DynamicAreaTextUnit

  • Packages that use DynamicAreaTextUnit 
    Package Description
    onbon.y2.play
    Y2 models for playing include the play list, the program, the standard areas, the audio, the bulletin and the dynamic area.
